mapper.update: update m_message set content=#{content} where id = #{id}
update m_message set `read` = true where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select me.* from m_message me,m_user u where me.addressee = u.id and me.`read`=false and u.username=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into m_message(send_time, content, addressee, `read`) values (#{sendTime},#{content},#{addressee.id},#{read})
